ingredients.ingredient: 15 oz ; canned kidney bean, 1 can ; (425 g)
15 oz ; canned black bean, 1 can ; (425 g)
15 oz ; canned corn kernels, 1 can ; (425 g)
15 oz ; canned diced tomato, 1 can ; (425 g)

steps.step: Add the ground beef and onion to a large pot and stir until the beef is cooked through.
Add the kidney beans, black beans, corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and taco seasoning to the pot, and stir until combined.
Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes.
Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, avocado, corn chips, lime wedges, and cilantro.

Add the kidney beans, black beans, corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and taco seasoning to the pot, and stir until combined.
Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes.
Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, avocado, corn chips, lime wedges, and cilantro.
